hero.title: Auto Body & Windshield Repair in Dielsdorf – Professional Service You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Expert auto repair services in Switzerland with direct insurance billing. Body damage repair, windshield repair, and hassle-free insurance claims handling – all from one trusted shop in Dielsdorf.

services.title: Our Complete Auto Repair Services
services.subtitle: Professional repair solutions for all vehicle damage with seamless insurance claim management

items.title: Body Damage Repair
items.description: Professional restoration of collision damage, dents, scratches, and paint work. We specialize in accident repairs and bodywork damage restoration, bringing your vehicle back to its original condition with expert craftsmanship.

items.title: Windshield Repair & Replacement
items.description: Fast windshield repair for stone chips or complete glass replacement when needed. Many small cracks can be repaired without full replacement, saving time and money with direct insurance billing.

items.title: Insurance Claim Assistance
items.description: Complete insurance damage handling from start to finish. We coordinate with your insurance company, manage all documentation, and ensure no upfront costs to you. Our direct billing system makes everything simple.

items.title: Swiss Quality Guarantee
items.description: Quality craftsmanship and Swiss precision from owner Luigi Reale and his experienced team. Fast appointment scheduling, transparent pricing, and guaranteed workmanship on every repair.

features.title: Why Choose Reale Continental?
features.subtitle: The trusted auto repair partner in the Zurich region

items.title: Fast & Hassle-Free Service
items.description: Quick appointments and streamlined service. Your vehicle is repaired and returned to you with minimal downtime. We respect your time and get the job done right the first time.

items.title: Direct Insurance Billing
items.description: No advance payment required. We handle all communication and billing directly with your insurance company. You simply drop off your vehicle – we handle the rest.

items.title: Swiss Quality & Expertise
items.description: Premium Swiss workmanship and materials. Original or equivalent parts only. Personal service from owner Luigi Reale with 5+ years of dedicated experience in professional auto repair.

process.title: Simple Repair Process
process.subtitle: Three easy steps from damage to restoration

steps.title: Contact & Schedule
steps.description: Call us or send a message to schedule your free consultation. We discuss the damage, answer your questions, and arrange a convenient appointment time.

steps.title: Assessment & Quote
steps.description: We inspect the damage, provide a detailed cost estimate, and coordinate with your insurance company to clarify coverage and approval.

steps.title: Expert Repair & Delivery
steps.description: Our certified technicians complete your repair with precision. You'll receive progress updates, and your vehicle is delivered in perfect condition with our quality guarantee.

about.title: About Reale Continental
about.subtitle: Experience meets Swiss quality
about.description: Luigi Reale leads a dedicated team with extensive experience in professional auto body repair and windshield services. Based in Dielsdorf, Switzerland, we serve private and business customers throughout the Zurich region with transparent, reliable service and Swiss-quality craftsmanship.

hero.title: Auto Repair Excellence: Luigi Reale and His Team – Your Partner in Dielsdorf, Switzerland
hero.subtitle: Swiss quality, personal service, and professional expertise. We've been your trusted partner for auto body repair and windshield services for 5+ years.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to delivering the highest quality auto repair services with personal attention to every customer. Our mission is to restore your vehicle with precision while making the repair process simple and stress-free through transparent communication and fair pricing.

items.title: Quality & Excellence
items.description: Premium Swiss craftsmanship in every repair. We use precision techniques and original or equivalent parts only. Your vehicle is restored to factory standards.

items.title: Reliability & Trustworthiness
items.description: Appointments honored, promises kept. We deliver on our commitments consistently. You can count on Reale Continental to get the job done right, on time, every time.

items.title: Transparent Communication
items.description: Clear, honest information at every step. Fair pricing with no hidden costs. You always know exactly what to expect and how your repair is progressing.

story.title: Our Journey to Excellence
story.subtitle: 5+ years serving the Zurich region with dedication

timeline.title: Founded with Purpose
timeline.description: Luigi Reale established Reale Continental GmbH to provide first-class auto repair services with personal attention. The vision: make professional, transparent auto repair accessible to everyone.

timeline.title: Service Growth
timeline.description: Expanded our service offerings to include comprehensive body damage repair, windshield services, and specialized insurance claim handling. Invested in modern repair equipment and training.

timeline.title: Regional Recognition
timeline.description: Established direct partnerships with Switzerland's major insurance companies. Known throughout the Zurich Unterland region for reliable, professional service and customer care.

timeline.title: Trusted Partner
timeline.description: Today, Reale Continental is recognized as one of the most trusted auto repair shops in the Dielsdorf area, serving hundreds of satisfied customers with proven results and unwavering commitment.

expertise.title: Our Auto Repair Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Specialized knowledge in body damage repair, windshield services, and insurance claim management
expertise.description: With 5+ years of dedicated experience, we have deep expertise in all types of vehicle damage repair. We understand both customer needs and insurance company processes inside and out. This dual expertise allows us to coordinate repairs seamlessly, handle all insurance documentation, and deliver fast, uncomplicated resolutions while maintaining Swiss quality standards throughout.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Expert technicians with passion for quality auto repair

members.name: Luigi Reale
members.description: Owner and founder with 5+ years of dedicated experience in professional auto body and windshield repair. Luigi personally oversees every major repair and maintains direct relationships with customers to ensure satisfaction and quality. His hands-on approach and commitment to excellence define the Reale Continental experience.

overview.title: Complete Auto Repair Solutions

items.title: Body Damage Repair
items.description: Expert restoration of collision damage, accident repairs, dents, paint damage, and bodywork issues. We use precision techniques and quality materials to restore your vehicle to factory specifications.

items.title: Windshield Repair & Replacement
items.description: Fast professional service for windshield damage. Many stone chips can be repaired without full replacement, saving time and money. Direct insurance billing available.

items.title: Insurance Claim Management
items.description: Complete handling of your insurance claim from start to finish. We coordinate directly with your insurance company, manage all documentation, and ensure zero upfront costs to you.

items.title: Convenience Services
items.description: Additional services designed for your comfort. Replacement vehicles, flexible pickup/delivery, and express service options available when you need quick turnaround.

bodywork.title: Expert Body Damage Repair
bodywork.description: Professional restoration of all types of bodywork damage. Whether from accidents, parking incidents, hail, or collision, we repair your vehicle with Swiss precision and craftsmanship. Our expert technicians use modern equipment and quality materials to ensure your car looks and performs like new.

features.title: Body Damage Repair Services
items: Bumper, fender, and body panel repair

windshield.title: Professional Windshield Service
windshield.description: Expert repair and replacement of windshields and vehicle glass. Many stone chips and small cracks can be repaired quickly without full replacement, saving you time and money. We handle direct insurance billing for seamless service. Fast turnaround and professional installation guaranteed.

insurance.title: Complete Insurance Claim Assistance
insurance.description: We're your partner for stress-free damage claim settlement. From initial damage assessment through final delivery, we handle everything with your insurance company. No upfront costs. Direct billing. Complete documentation. We coordinate all communication so you can focus on getting your life back to normal.

process.title: Our Professional Repair Workflow
process.subtitle: Transparent, professional service from damage to delivery

steps.title: Contact & Schedule
steps.description: Reach out by phone or email with details about your damage. We'll discuss your situation and arrange a convenient inspection appointment with no obligation.

steps.title: Assessment & Estimate
steps.description: We thoroughly inspect the damage, create a detailed cost estimate, and coordinate directly with your insurance company to clarify coverage and approval for the repair.

steps.title: Professional Repair
steps.description: Once approved, our certified technicians begin expert repair work. You receive regular progress updates and we maintain the highest quality standards throughout the entire repair process.

steps.title: Quality Check & Delivery
steps.description: We perform thorough final inspection and testing. Your vehicle is delivered in perfect condition with our complete quality guarantee. All work is backed by our warranty.

items.title: Quality Guarantee
items.description: All repairs meet the highest professional quality standards. We guarantee workmanship and lasting results on every repair we complete.

items.title: Original & Equivalent Parts
items.description: We use only original manufacturer parts or certified equivalent replacements. No compromises on quality, durability, or fit.

items.title: Workmanship Warranty
items.description: Full statutory warranty on all work performed. We stand behind our repairs with confidence in our expertise and materials.

items.name: Peter H.
items.text: Excellent work on my rear-end collision repair. Fast, professional service and the insurance claim settlement was handled perfectly by the team. Highly recommended!

hero.title: Imprint
hero.subtitle: Legal company information as required by Swiss law

content.title: Liability for Website Content
content.text: The content of our website has been created with the utmost care and diligence. However, we cannot assume responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of all information provided on these pages.

links.title: Liability for External Links
links.text: Our website contains links to external websites operated by third parties. We have no control over the content of these external sites and therefore cannot accept responsibility for their contents or availability.

copyright.title: Copyright Protection
copyright.text: All contents and works published on this website are subject to Swiss copyright law. Reproduction, distribution, or any other use of content beyond the boundaries of copyright law requires the prior written permission of the copyright holder.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: How we handle and protect your personal data

intro.title: Our Data Protection Commitment
intro.text: Reale Continental GmbH takes the protection of your personal data very seriously. We handle all personal information with strict confidentiality in compliance with Swiss data protection laws, including the Federal Data Protection Act (FADP).

contact.title: Contact Form Information
contact.text: When you submit information through our contact form, your name, email address, phone number, and message are collected and stored. This data is used to respond to your inquiry and for follow-up communication regarding your repair request or questions.

logs.title: Automatic Server Log Data
logs.intro: Our web server automatically collects and stores information that your browser transmits. This technical data includes:
items: Date and time of your request

rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
rights.text: You have the right at any time to request information about what personal data we have stored about you, where it came from, who we've shared it with, and what we're using it for. You also have the right to request corrections, deletion, or blocking of your data. Contact us using the details in our Imprint to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Privacy Questions
contact.text: If you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your data, or to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us using the contact details provided in our Imprint.
